TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23espselect ab.account_id, aa.account_attribute_id, (select d1.orion_code from dnb_state_province_county d1 where d1.country_code_lov_id = aa.phys_country_code_lov_id and (regexp_replace(upper(d1.dnb_descrip), '[^A-Z0-9]', '') = regexp_replace(upper(aa.phys_state_province_non_us_co), '[^A-Z0-9]', '') or regexp_replace(upper(d1.dnb_code), '[^A-Z0-9]', '') = regexp_replace(upper(aa.phys_state_province_non_us_co), '[^A-Z0-9]', ''))), (select d2.orion_code from dnb_state_province_county d2 where d2.country_code_lov_id = aa.mail_country_code_lov_id and (regexp_replace(upper(d2.dnb_descrip), '[^A-Z0-9]', '') = regexp_replace(upper(aa.mail_state_province_non_us_co), '[^A-Z0-9]', '') or regexp_replace(upper(d2.dnb_code), '[^A-Z0-9]', '') = regexp_replace(upper(aa.mail_state_province_non_us_co), '[^A-Z0-9]', ''))) from account_base ab, cdhub_error ce, account_cdhub ac, account_attribute aa where ab.account_id = to_number(ce.orion_entity_id) and ab.account_id = ac.account_cdhub_id(+) and ab.primary_account_attribute_id = aa.account_attribute_id and upper(ce.error_thrown) like '%IS NOT VALID FOR%' and upper(ce.error_thrown) like '%COMPANY.ADDRESS%' and ce.action_attempted = 'AccountSave' and ab.input_source = 'DNB' and ac.account_cdhub_id is null
